description: DOOMLORD In a particularly earthy and dusty part of the Elemental Plane of Air, one fi nds Citadel Alluvius, a mighty tower that The walls of existence are tumbling down. Though the long ago fell on its side. The original ceilings and fl oors are chinks and cracks may not be obvious to all, knowledge of now the walls, and the curving walls now serve as concave their continual collapse is the impetus to the doomlord’s fl oors and convex ceilings. The stone staircases are useless, worldview. Nothing can prevent this collapse—so why not running sideways through the tower. join in, and exult in the eventual end of all? On the Elemental Plane of Fire, the Crumbling Citadel A doomlord’s life holds the greatest appeal for fi ghters slowly turns into ruin. and barbarians who enjoy smashing and destroying. Some The Citadel Sealt is a large, echoing vault excavated in a rogues, rangers, and clerics, especially those devoted to section of the Elemental Plane of Earth composed of crystal- deities with the Destruction or Death domains, join the lized salt. ranks of the faction. Surrounded on all sides by the nothingness of the Neg- NPC doomlords include soldiers, blackguards, anarchists, ative Energy Plane, the Citadel Exhalus drifts through and just about anyone who kills people or breaks objects. the void. They make excellent villains or interesting allies because they can be of any alignment. They act with a focus on LORE OF THE DOOMGUARD entropy, not evil.
